meanings.definition: In a way that is not connected or attached to anything else.
meanings.sent1: The twins played separately in their own rooms.
meanings.sent2: She washed the dishes and the glasses separately.
meanings.sent3: The socks and shoes decided to go their separate ways, walking separately down the street.
meanings.sent4: The stars in the sky shone separately, each one twinkling on its own.
meanings.sent5: The puzzle pieces were kept separately in different boxes to avoid mixing them up.

meanings.sent1: The students worked separately on their assignments.
meanings.sent2: They arrived at the party separately, each one in their own car.
meanings.sent3: The crayons in the box argued about who could color more pages separately.
meanings.sent4: The flowers in the garden bloomed separately, each showing off its unique color.
meanings.sent5: The ingredients were placed separately on the counter before starting the recipe.
